ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:13:50 [Issue ID 4000-2419565] urn:comicvine:4000-2419565 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/2419565 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-19 09:25:26. [Issue ID 247375]
ComicInfo.Summary:
“RESURRECTION,” CONCLUSION
What happened to Eddie Collins? Where is his father, James? How did Paul Johnstone come back from the dead? And what does any of this have to do with the events in Image United? At long last, the answers are revealed! The conclusion to the Resurrection story arc!
*Notes:* The first cover is a homage to the Pieta. The second cover is a homage to the cover of Baffling Mysteries #7. The second cover is a homage to the cover of Crisis on Infinite Earths #7.
ComicInfo.Tags: Atrocity,ShadowHawks (in flashback,gives body to resurrect Paul Johnstone),Eve Hohner (death),James Collins (in flashback,spirits of all who have worn the mantle),Captain Nieves,Rachel (James Collins' girlfriend)
ComicInfo.Title: Resurrection, Part Five
